name: Puncturing Strikes
base_effect: Channel a flurry of strikes dealing Physical Damage over 1 second. The final strike deals 300% increased damage. Enemies hit by the final strike are knocked back 4 meters.

name: Biting Jabs
base_effect: Channel a flurry of strikes dealing Physical Damage over 1 second. The final strike deals 300% increased damage and knocks back enemies 4 meters. Each hit increases your Critical Strike chance by 5% for 5 seconds, stacking up to 4 times.

name: Puncturing Sweep
base_effect: Channel a flurry of strikes dealing Physical Damage over 1 second. The final strike deals 300% increased damage and knocks back enemies 4 meters. Heals you for 40% of damage done.

name: Piercing Javelin
base_effect: Hurl a spear at an enemy dealing Physical Damage and knocking them back 6 meters, stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

name: Aurora Javelin
base_effect: Hurl a spear at an enemy dealing Physical Damage and knocking them back 6 meters, stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Deals up to 40% more damage based on distance from target.

name: Binding Javelin
base_effect: Hurl a spear at an enemy dealing Physical Damage, stunning them for 2.5 seconds. Target does not get knocked back.

name: Focused Charge
base_effect: Charge with your divine lance to enemy, dealing Magic Damage. Interrupts the target if casting.

name: Explosive Charge
base_effect: Charge with your divine lance to enemy, dealing Magic Damage to the target and nearby enemies. Interrupts the target if casting.

name: Toppling Charge
base_effect: Charge with your divine lance to enemy, dealing Magic Damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Interrupts the target if casting and sets them off balance.

name: Spear Shards
base_effect: Send your spear into the heavens and call down a shower of divine wrath dealing Magic Damage to enemies in the target area and stunning them for 2 seconds. An ally near the spear can activate the Blessed Shards synergy.

name: Luminous Shards
base_effect: Send your spear into the heavens and call down a shower of divine wrath dealing Magic Damage to enemies in the target area and stunning them for 2 seconds. An ally near the spear can activate the Holy Shards synergy, restoring Magicka or Stamina.

name: Blazing Spear
base_effect: Send your spear into the heavens and call down a shower of divine wrath dealing Magic Damage to enemies in the target area and stunning them for 2 seconds. The spear continues to deal Magic Damage every 1 second for 10 seconds. An ally near the spear can activate the Blessed Shards synergy.

name: Sun Shield
base_effect: Surround yourself with solar rays, granting a damage shield equal to 30% of your Max Health for 6 seconds. Nearby enemies take Magic Damage when the shield is activated.

name: Radiant Ward
base_effect: Surround yourself with solar rays, granting a damage shield equal to 30% of your Max Health for 6 seconds. Shield strength increases by 4% for each enemy hit, up to 5 times. Nearby enemies take Magic Damage when the shield is activated.

name: Blazing Shield
base_effect: Surround yourself with solar rays, granting a damage shield equal to 30% of your Max Health for 6 seconds. When the shield expires, nearby enemies take Magic Damage equal to 50% of damage absorbed.

name: Radial Sweep
base_effect: Sweep your aedric spear around you dealing Physical Damage to all nearby enemies.

name: Empowering Sweep
base_effect: Sweep your aedric spear around you dealing Physical Damage to all nearby enemies. Gain a damage shield for each enemy hit that absorbs damage for 5 seconds.

name: Crescent Sweep
base_effect: Sweep your aedric spear around you dealing Physical Damage to all nearby enemies, and an additional 50% damage to enemies in front of you.

name: Piercing Spear
base_effect: Increases Critical Damage done with Aedric Spear abilities by 10%.

name: Spear Wall
base_effect: Increases block mitigation by 10% while you have an Aedric Spear ability slotted.

name: Burning Light
base_effect: Dealing damage with Aedric Spear abilities has a 25% chance to deal additional Magic Damage.

name: Balanced Warrior
base_effect: Increases Weapon Damage and Spell Damage by 6%.

name: Sun Fire
base_effect: Blast an enemy with a charge of solar energy, dealing Flame Damage and additional Flame Damage over 8.2 seconds. Applies Minor Maim to the enemy, reducing their damage done by 5% for the duration.

name: Vampire's Bane
base_effect: Blast an enemy with a charge of solar energy, dealing Flame Damage and additional Flame Damage over 16.5 seconds. Applies Minor Maim to the enemy, reducing their damage done by 5% for the duration.

name: Reflective Light
base_effect: Blast up to 3 enemies with a charge of solar energy, dealing Flame Damage and additional Flame Damage over 8.2 seconds. Applies Minor Maim to enemies, reducing their damage done by 5% for the duration. Grants you Minor Sorcery, increasing Spell Damage by 10%.

name: Solar Flare
base_effect: Conjure a ball of solar energy to heave at an enemy, dealing Magic Damage. Grants you Empower for 3 seconds, increasing the damage of your next Heavy Attack by 80%.

name: Dark Flare
base_effect: Conjure a ball of solar energy to heave at an enemy, dealing Magic Damage and applying Major Defile for 4 seconds, reducing healing received by 16%. Grants you Empower for 3 seconds, increasing the damage of your next Heavy Attack by 80%.

name: Solar Barrage
base_effect: Summon solar energy to blast enemies around you dealing Magic Damage every 2 seconds for 10 seconds. Grants you Empower for 3 seconds whenever this deals damage, increasing the damage of your next Heavy Attack by 80%.

name: Backlash
base_effect: Summon an aura of divine light to envelop an enemy for 6 seconds. After 6 seconds the enemy takes Magic Damage plus 20% of all damage dealt during this time as additional Magic Damage.

name: Power of the Light
base_effect: Summon an aura of divine light to envelop an enemy for 6 seconds. Applies Minor Breach to the enemy, reducing their Resistances by 2974. After 6 seconds the enemy takes Physical Damage plus 20% of all damage dealt during this time as additional Physical Damage.

name: Purifying Light
base_effect: Summon an aura of divine light to envelop an enemy for 6 seconds. After 6 seconds the enemy takes Magic Damage plus 20% of all damage dealt during this time as additional Magic Damage. When the effect ends, allies within 5 meters of the enemy are healed.

name: Eclipse
base_effect: Shroud an enemy in a cloak of darkness for 6 seconds. The next 3 attacks made by the enemy will be reflected back at them.

name: Total Dark
base_effect: Shroud an enemy in a cloak of darkness for 6 seconds. The next 6 attacks made by the enemy will be reflected back at them.

name: Unstable Core
base_effect: Shroud an enemy in a cloak of darkness for 6 seconds. The next 3 attacks made by the enemy will be reflected back at them. When the effect ends, the enemy explodes dealing Magic Damage to them and nearby enemies.

name: Radiant Destruction
base_effect: Channel a beam of pure sunlight to burn an enemy dealing Magic Damage over 1.8 seconds. Damage dealt increases by up to 480% to enemies under 50% Health.

name: Radiant Glory
base_effect: Channel a beam of pure sunlight to burn an enemy dealing Magic Damage over 1.8 seconds. Damage dealt increases by up to 480% to enemies under 50% Health. Heals you for a percentage of the damage done based on the enemy's missing Health.

name: Radiant Oppression
base_effect: Channel a beam of pure sunlight to burn an enemy dealing Magic Damage over 1.8 seconds. Damage dealt increases by up to 480% to enemies under 50% Health. Costs less Magicka to cast.

name: Nova
base_effect: Call down a fragment of the sun at the target location, dealing Magic Damage to all enemies in the area every 1 second for 8 seconds. Enemies in the area have Major Maim applied, reducing their damage done by 10%. Allies in the area can activate the Supernova synergy, dealing Magic Damage to all enemies.

name: Solar Prison
base_effect: Call down a fragment of the sun at the target location, dealing Magic Damage to all enemies in the area every 1 second for 8 seconds. Enemies in the area have Major Maim applied, reducing their damage done by 10%. Enemies in the area are also stunned for 4 seconds. Allies in the area can activate the Supernova synergy, dealing Magic Damage to all enemies.

name: Solar Disturbance
base_effect: Call down a fragment of the sun at the target location, dealing Magic Damage to all enemies in the area every 1 second for 12 seconds. Enemies in the area have Major Maim applied, reducing their damage done by 10%. Allies in the area can activate the Supernova synergy, dealing Magic Damage to all enemies. Increased duration.

name: Enduring Rays
base_effect: Increases the duration of Dawn's Wrath abilities by 10%.

name: Prism
base_effect: Gain 3 Ultimate when you cast a Dawn's Wrath ability.

name: Illuminate
base_effect: Casting a Dawn's Wrath ability grants Minor Sorcery to you and nearby allies for 20 seconds, increasing Spell Damage by 10%.

name: Restoring Spirit
base_effect: Reduces the Magicka, Stamina, and Ultimate cost of all abilities by 4%.

name: Rushed Ceremony
base_effect: Invoke a hasty healing rite to heal yourself or an injured ally in front of you.

name: Honor the Dead
base_effect: Invoke a hasty healing rite to heal yourself or an injured ally in front of you. If the target is under 50% Health, restore Magicka to you over 2 seconds.

name: Breath of Life
base_effect: Invoke a hasty healing rite to heal yourself and up to 2 injured allies in front of you.

name: Healing Ritual
base_effect: Invoke a rite of restoration that heals you and nearby allies.

name: Ritual of Rebirth
base_effect: Invoke a rite of restoration that heals you and nearby allies. Heals you for an additional amount over 5 seconds.

name: Hasty Prayer
base_effect: Invoke a rite of restoration that heals you and nearby allies. No longer has a cast time.

name: Restoring Aura
base_effect: Manifest an aura of restoration for you for 10 seconds. Grants Minor Fortitude, increasing Health Recovery by 10%. Grants Minor Intellect, increasing Magicka Recovery by 10%. Grants Minor Endurance, increasing Stamina Recovery by 10%.

name: Radiant Aura
base_effect: Manifest an aura of restoration for you and nearby allies for 10 seconds. Grants Minor Fortitude, increasing Health Recovery by 10%. Grants Minor Intellect, increasing Magicka Recovery by 10%. Grants Minor Endurance, increasing Stamina Recovery by 10%.

name: Repentance
base_effect: Draw on the fallen to convert corpses into pure energy. Each corpse consumed heals you and nearby allies and restores Stamina. No cost.

name: Cleansing Ritual
base_effect: Create a circle of consecrated ground that heals you and allies in the area every 2 seconds for 12 seconds. Cleanses a negative effect when activated and each tick. Allies in the area can activate the Purify synergy, cleansing all negative effects.

name: Extended Ritual
base_effect: Create a circle of consecrated ground that heals you and allies in the area every 2 seconds for 16 seconds. Cleanses a negative effect when activated and each tick. Increased radius and duration. Allies in the area can activate the Purify synergy, cleansing all negative effects.

name: Ritual of Retribution
base_effect: Create a circle of consecrated ground that heals you and allies in the area every 2 seconds for 12 seconds, and deals Magic Damage to enemies every 2 seconds. Cleanses a negative effect when activated and each tick. Allies in the area can activate the Purify synergy, cleansing all negative effects.
rank_progression: Increases healing and damage per rank

name: Rune Focus
base_effect: Invoke a rune of celestial protection for 15 seconds. While standing within the rune, you gain Minor Resolve and Minor Ward, increasing Physical and Spell Resistance. You also heal every 1 second.
rank_progression: Increases healing and resistances per rank

name: Channeled Focus
base_effect: Invoke a rune of celestial protection for 15 seconds. While standing within the rune, you gain Minor Resolve and Minor Ward, increasing Physical and Spell Resistance. You also heal every 1 second and restore Magicka every 1 second.
rank_progression: Increases healing and resistances per rank

name: Restoring Focus
base_effect: Invoke a rune of celestial protection for 15 seconds. While standing within the rune, you gain Major Resolve and Major Ward, increasing Physical and Spell Resistance. You also heal every 1 second.
rank_progression: Increases healing and resistances per rank

name: Rite of Passage
base_effect: Channel the grace of the divines to heal you and nearby allies every 0.5 seconds for 4 seconds. While channeling, you take 20% reduced damage. Allies in the area take 20% reduced damage.

name: Remembrance
base_effect: Channel the grace of the divines to heal you and nearby allies every 0.5 seconds for 4 seconds. While channeling, you take 20% reduced damage. Allies in the area take 20% reduced damage. You take an additional 20% reduced damage while channeling.

name: Practiced Incantation
base_effect: Channel the grace of the divines to heal you and nearby allies every 0.5 seconds for 6 seconds. While channeling, you take 20% reduced damage. Allies in the area take 20% reduced damage. Increased duration.

name: Mending
base_effect: Increases healing done on allies under 50% Health by 8%.

name: Sacred Ground
base_effect: Restoring Light abilities that require you to stay within an area of effect grant Minor Mending, increasing your healing done by 8%.

name: Light Weaver
base_effect: Gain 2 Ultimate when activating a Restoring Light ability while in combat.

name: Master Ritualist
base_effect: Increases resurrect speed by 20%. When you resurrect an ally, you and the ally gain a damage shield for 3 seconds.
rank_progression: 10% speed and increased shield per rank
